Localization.Name: Broad & Rabiee
Localization.Description: Founded by a pair of aerospace engineers, Broad & Rabiee began with a line of computers and components before branching out to turrets.

English.Name: Broad & Rabiee
English.Description: Founded by a pair of aerospace engineers, Broad & Rabiee began with a line of computers and components before branching out to turrets.

Localization.Name: MPUV-1C TSB Flight Blade
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Broad & Rabiee
Type: Flight Blade

Unlock the potential of your Argo MPUV-1C with the TSB Flight Blade from Broad & Rabiee. By re-allocating lateral thrust resources, you can expect your ship deliver increased top speeds in the straightaway.
